findings.liver: Hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits, contour smooth, no focal mass, main portal vein patent with hepatopetal flow, no ascites.
findings.bile_ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation, common bile duct mildly dilated (8 mm).
findings.gallbladder: Cholelithiasis, gallbladder wall thickening and edema, edema within gallbladder fossa, concerning for acute cholecystitis.
findings.pancreas: Not well visualized, obscured by bowel gas.
findings.kidneys: Limited views of right kidney show no hydronephrosis.
findings.retroperitoneum: Visualized portions of aorta and IVC within normal limits.
